duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to general HR related inquiries and provide assistance to employees.
Perform data entry and process various personnel actions related to HR.
Handle phone calls and communication with employees and other HR team members.
Utilize automated reports and dashboards to interpret and enter HR-related data.
Coordinate tasks with HR team members using strong interpersonal communication skills.
Use systems such as ServiceNow, HR system, Outlook, and HR Portal for HR-related tasks.
Ensure attention to detail, accuracy, and analytical skills in all HR-related activities.
